ESP.ORIGINAL: GREETING
ESP.TRADUIT: 问好

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the fuck do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMaster_GREETING_0000102E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMaster_GREETING_00001039_1.ogg

NPC : Tunney [02003678] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMaster_HELLO_00001038_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMaster_GOODBYE_00001036_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to sign up for a fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想报名参加战斗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to fight in my ring? One look, I could tell you weren't a fighter. You know what you are? You're a tomato.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想在我的擂台上战斗吗？一看就知道你不是一个战士。你知道你是什么吗？你是一个西红柿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_0000103B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What makes you think you're good enough to step on my canvas and trade shots with a professional?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是什么让你认为你足够优秀，可以踏上我的画布并与专业人士交换镜头？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_0000103B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, it's going to be tomato versus tomato in this "bout". It's more like a fucking handicap convention with this matchup.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，这场“较量”将是番茄与番茄之间的较量。这场比赛更像是一场他妈的让分大会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_00001050_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're fighting Porcelain Johnny, whose name is not ironic. He's a fucking weakling. If you can't beat him, you're lower than a tomato.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你正在与瓷器约翰尼战斗，他的名字并不讽刺。他就是个该死的弱者。如果你打不过他，那你连西红柿都比不上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_00001050_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since this is your first fight, I need to explain some things. Whatever you might have heard or read about boxing, I have my own rules here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于这是你们的第一次战斗，我需要解释一些事情。无论您听说过或读到过有关拳击的内容，我在这里都有我自己的规则。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_00001050_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You enter the ring, and you start fighting. Your opponent gets knocked out, you win. If you start getting your ass beat, I'll throw in the towel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你进入擂台，然后开始战斗。你的对手被淘汰，你就赢了。如果你开始挨打，我就认输。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_00001050_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's unusual, but fatalities can happen. You must protect yourself at all times. Let me repeat that: protect yourself at all times. Good to go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这很不寻常，但死亡的情况可能会发生。你必须时刻保护自己。让我重复一遍：时刻保护自己。好走了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_00001050_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're moving up from losers to has-beens now. Your opponent is Old Roy Palmer, who was a decent fighter back in his prime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在正在从失败者变成过气人。你的对手是老罗伊·帕尔默，他在巅峰时期是一位不错的拳击手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_00001E90_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Old bastard couldn't keep his wick dry, so now he's paying child support for a dozen different kids. Retirement is out of the question for him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老混蛋无法保持他的灯芯干燥，所以现在他正在为十几个不同的孩子支付子女抚养费。退休对于他来说是不可能的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_00001E90_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He knows a few tricks, but nothing that should slow you down. Ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他知道一些技巧，但不会让你慢下来。准备好？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_00001E90_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've graduated from geriatrics to dregs and burnouts now. You'll be fighting Dirty Don Juan, a part-time raider and full-time chem addict.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在已经从老年病学走向了渣滓和倦怠。你将与​​肮脏的唐璜战斗，他是一名兼职袭击者和全职化学瘾君子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_00002469_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One match he was so high that he shit himself in the ring, smeared it all over his opponent in the clinch, ended up winning, the nasty fuck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一场比赛，他太兴奋了，以至于他把自己拉到了擂台上，在扭打中把它弄脏了对手，最后赢了，该死的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_00002469_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's not particularly skilled, but he is fast and crazy, and sometimes that's enough. You ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的技术不是特别好，但他又快又疯狂，有时这就足够了。你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_00002469_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you've invested in protection, because this cocksucker you're fighting is infamous for low blows.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你已经投入了保护措施，因为你正在对抗的这个混蛋因低打击而臭名昭著。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_00002476_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In fact, he's called Fifty Balls because... it's the first thing he hits. Besides the crotch shots, he can fight a little. You ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，他被称为“五十个球”，因为……这是他击中的第一个东西。除了胯下射击之外，他还能打一点。你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_00002476_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This next one might be the first real fighter that you've faced. Name is Tommy Mullet, a big, shitkicking country boy with a mean right hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下一个可能是您遇到的第一个真正的战士。他的名字叫汤米·马莱特，是一个身材魁梧、脾气暴躁的乡下男孩，右手很凶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_00002480_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It will be a bigger crowd for this match, so expect a bump in the purse. You ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这场比赛将会有更多的观众，所以预计钱包会有所增加。你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_00002480_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll be fighting Flutter Tang, who ain't exactly the biggest, but he's fast and he has a wicked hook. Best to keep your distance. You ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你将与 Flutter Tang 战斗，Flutter Tang 并不是最大的，但他速度很快，而且有一个邪恶的钩子。最好保持距离。你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_0000248A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome to the big leagues, scrapper. When I say big, I mean seven feet of crazed, Mexican ghoul big. You have the privilege of facing El Guapo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎来到大联盟，斗士。当我说大时，我指的是七英尺长的疯狂墨西哥食尸鬼。你有幸面对埃尔瓜波。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_00002492_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's the biggest goddamn zombie I've ever seen, and he's moves surprisingly well for his size. He can throw a punch, and he can take a punch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是我见过的最大的该死的僵尸，而且就他的体型而言，他的动作出奇的好。他可以出拳，也可以承受拳头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_00002492_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In other words, you've got your work cut out for you tonight. You ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 换句话说，今晚你的工作已经完成。你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_00002492_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Drederick Dementia is your next opponent. He has one of the toughest chins in boxing history. He's also got the intellectual faculties of a squirrel.
ESP.TRADUIT: Drederick Dementia 是你的下一个对手。他拥有拳击史上最坚韧的下巴之一。他还拥有松鼠的智力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_000024AD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might be thinking, "Squirrels, that's not too bad." Wrong. Squirrels can scurry up your pants and gnaw your dick off with their incisors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能会想，“松鼠，这还不错。”错误的。松鼠会爬上你的裤子，用门牙咬掉你的鸡鸡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_000024AD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what Drederick is, a nasty little squirrel that won't go away. You might have to kill the sonofabitch to win this thing. Ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是德雷德里克，一只讨厌的小松鼠，不会消失。你可能必须杀死那个王八蛋才能赢得这件事。准备好？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_000024AD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is going to be your first real matchup. You're facing Diabetes Leonard, a fast, polished fighter with good all-around ability.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这将是你们第一次真正的对决。你面对的是糖尿病伦纳德，他是一位速度快、技术精湛、全能能力强的战士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_000024B6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch for him to slip around and hit you outside your field of vision. He'll try to use his speed, so you might try tying him up in a corner. Ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心他溜走并在你的视野之外击中你。他会尝试利用他的速度，所以你可以尝试把他绑在角落里。准备好？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_000024B6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope your cardio is squared away, because this next fucker will push you to the limit. You're fighting Bull Rocco, a sawed-off demon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你的有氧运动能够顺利进行，因为下一个混蛋会把你推向极限。你正在与布尔·罗科（Bull Rocco）战斗，他是一个被锯掉的恶魔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_000024C1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's got limited reach, bad footwork, and uneven power, but fucking hell does he have a chin, with stamina to boot. You ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的触及范围有限，步法不佳，力量参差不齐，但他妈的他有下巴，还有耐力。你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_000024C1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is it, the final obstacle before the title shot. This ain't no speed bump, though. Bruce Ali is the quickest bastard to ever step in the ring.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是冠军争夺前的最后障碍。不过，这并不是什么减速带。布鲁斯·阿里是有史以来踏入擂台最快的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_000024C9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In addition to the blinding speed, he has deceptive power and a decent chin. If you want a shot, you'll have to find a way to win. You ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了令人眼花缭乱的速度之外，他还拥有欺骗性的力量和得体的下巴。如果你想获得机会，就必须找到获胜的方法。你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_000024C9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Title Shot - First time}Whatever you may have heard about the defending champ, he is much, much worse in actuality. For starters, he's a fucking supermutant.
ESP.TRADUIT: {标题镜头 - 第一次}无论你对卫冕冠军有什么了解，他实际上要糟糕得多。首先，他是个该死的超级变种人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_000027B3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While he may be a touch short by mutant standards, he's still fucking enormous by ours. He's far from slow, and he hits like a fucking howitzer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然按照变种人的标准来看他可能有点矮，但按照我们的标准来看他仍然是巨大的。他的速度一点也不慢，而且他的攻击力就像一门该死的榴弹炮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_000027B3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To top it all off, he doesn't wear gloves. Last time a referee tried to make him lace up? Mike ate his face, then warned he would, "Eat his babies."
ESP.TRADUIT: 最重要的是，他没有戴手套。上次裁判试图让他系鞋带是什么时候？迈克吃了他的脸，然后警告他要“吃掉他的孩子。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_000027B3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's ferocious, insane, and the only thing left between you and the title. I know you can do this, even if you are a tomato. How about it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他凶猛、疯狂，是你和头衔之间唯一的障碍。我知道你可以做到这一点，即使你是一个西红柿。这个怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_000027B3_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Title Shot - Repeat}Not long after you lost the title, old Adamantium Mike stepped up to reclaim it. You're gonna have to go through him to get the belt... again.
ESP.TRADUIT: {标题镜头 - 重复}在你失去标题后不久，老亚当曼迈克就站出来夺回了它。你必须再次穿过他才能拿到腰带。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_00002A9C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Title Defense}Not a problem. I've already got some kid lined up for you. Are you ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: {标题防御}没问题。我已经派了一个孩子来等你。你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_00002AA4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to fight in a title defense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想参加卫冕战。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, ok. You've got a little ability, that's good. It will take more than that to make it in this business, you understand?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的好的。你有一点能力，那很好。要在这个行业取得成功，需要的不仅仅是这些，你明白吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_0000104A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before I put you in the ring, we need to work on your image... you need a name, something that makes you stand out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我把你放进戒指之前，我们需要处理你的形象……你需要一个名字，一个能让你脱颖而出的名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_0000104A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, I got it. From here on out, you're "The Kid." It's youthful, makes you seem like a perpetual underdog, people always like that bullshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，我知道了。从现在开始，你就是“小子”了。它很年轻，让你看起来永远是个失败者，人们总是喜欢这种废话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_0000104A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I may not have any titles, but you better believe I can scrap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可能没有任何头衔，但你最好相信我可以报废。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am the slayer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是杀手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, ok. You've got a little ability, that's good. It will take more than that to make it in this business, you understand?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的好的。你有一点能力，那很好。要在这个行业取得成功，需要的不仅仅是这些，你明白吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_0000105A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't met anyone who can knock me down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还没有遇到可以击倒我的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can throw a good punch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以打出一记好拳。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, ok. You've got a little ability, that's good. It will take more than that to make it in this business, you understand?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的好的。你有一点能力，那很好。要在这个行业取得成功，需要的不仅仅是这些，你明白吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_00002179_1.ogg

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_00002179_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need caps. You put me in the ring and I'll do whatever it takes to win.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要瓶盖。你让我上擂台，我会不惜一切代价赢得胜利。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're hungry, I like that. We could use more of that attitude around here, even if it is from a tomato.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你饿了，我喜欢这样。我们可以在这里更多地使用这种态度，即使它来自西红柿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_00001055_1.ogg

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_00001055_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, I got it. From here on out, you're "The Kid." It's youthful, makes you seem like a perpetual underdog, people always like that bullshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，我知道了。从现在开始，你就是“小子”了。它很年轻，让你看起来永远是个失败者，人们总是喜欢这种废话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRWantToFig_00001055_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那算了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the fuck do you think? Caps, dummy. Everything is about caps. Reno is bloated with fighters, trainers, and managers, but it's wide open here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的觉得怎么样？帽子，假人。一切都与帽子有关。里诺到处都是拳手、训练员和管理者，但这里却很开放。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaDempseyAboutY_00003674_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I asked a promoter, "What's the fight game like in Vegas?" He says, "Fight game? What fucking fight game?"
ESP.TRADUIT: 我问一位发起人，“维加斯的格斗游戏是什么样的？”他说：“格斗游戏？什么他妈的格斗游戏？”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaDempseyAboutY_00003674_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I smelled an opportunity, so here I am. Frankly, I'm a little sad that this shithole is all the boxing in town, but it's better than nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我嗅到了机会，所以我来了。坦白说，我有点难过这个混蛋全是镇上的拳击，但总比什么都没有好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaDempseyAboutY_00003674_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean for shit's sake, it's Vegas! They should have a ring in every casino! All I see is mimes and oversexed wiseguys - it's a disgrace!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是天哪，这是维加斯！每个赌场都应该有一枚戒指！我所看到的只是哑剧和性欲过剩的智者——这是一种耻辱！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaDempseyAboutY_00003674_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What brought you to New Vegas?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要来新维加斯？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not really. First thing I did when I got in town was go to the Thorn, heard they had some sort of cage matches, thought they could host prize fights.
ESP.TRADUIT: 并不真地。当我到达城里时，我做的第一件事就是去荆棘球场，听说他们有某种笼式比赛，认为他们可以举办拳击比赛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaDempseyAboutY_00003675_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was a fucking mistake. That little ginger slut running the place tells me they pit critters against each other, sometimes people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是一个他妈的错误。经营这个地方的那个小姜荡妇告诉我，他们让动物互相对抗，有时甚至是人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaDempseyAboutY_00003675_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was only then that I realized just how bad things were here. You could fight bugs, but not a single venue for the sweet science. Shameful!
ESP.TRADUIT: 直到那时我才意识到这里的情况有多糟糕。你可以对抗虫子，但没有一个地方可以进行甜蜜的科学。可耻！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaDempseyAboutY_00003675_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Consider this place an initial step in righting things around here. Vegas won't play second fiddle to Reno, not if I can help it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 认为这个地方是纠正这里问题的第一步。如果我能帮助的话，维加斯不会屈居里诺之后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you plan on opening a new gym when you came here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来这里的时候有打算开一家新健身房吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because property rights are fuckall around here, that's why. Say I pay off the Kings, open up some place in Freeside. Everything starts out great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为这里的产权根本就是他妈的，这就是原因。假设我还清了国王队的钱，在 Freeside 开设了一些地方。一切都开始得很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaDempseyAboutY_00003676_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One week later, somebody's crawling up my ass, whining that this spot is reserved for Dana's House of Dildos, or whatever bullshit thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一周后，有人爬上我的屁股，抱怨这个位置是为达纳假阳具之家保留的，或者其他什么废话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaDempseyAboutY_00003676_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trust me, I know how these things work. It's better to pick an "odd" place that you know is yours. Tunney keeps the Fiends out, so it works.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信我，我知道这些东西是如何运作的。最好选择一个你知道属于你的“奇怪”的地方。汤尼将恶魔拒之门外，所以这很有效。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaDempseyAboutY_00003676_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This seems like an odd place to open a gym. Why didn't you open it in Freeside or Westside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这似乎是一个开健身房的奇怪地方。你为什么不在 Freeside 或 Westside 打开它？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaDempseyGoodby_00001048_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to collect my winnings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想领取我的奖金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got it, champ. Come back tomorrow and I'll set you up with another match.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你明白了，冠军。明天回来，我会给你安排另一场比赛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaRefereeVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_00001E8F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I defended the title, and I'd like to collect my winnings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我卫冕了，我想领取我的奖金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck me sideways with a bag of dicks... we have a new champion! Congratulations, you've come a long way from tomato.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用一袋鸡巴从侧面操我......我们有一个新冠军！恭喜你，你已经远离番茄了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaRefereeVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_00002AAA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This don't mean you can sit on your ass or forget about fighting. On the contrary, there's a stable of challengers waiting for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这并不意味着你可以袖手旁观或忘记战斗。相反，有一大批挑战者在等着你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_00002AAA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, you can only defend the title once per day, but the purse is very sweet. Just don't lose. Anyway, I'm proud of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，你每天只能卫冕一次，但钱包很丰厚。只是不要输。无论如何，我为你感到骄傲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_00002AAA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never thought I'd see the day when you'd be the number one challenger, but it's here. If you think this purse is nice, you ain't seen nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从未想过有一天你会成为第一挑战者，但它就在这里。如果您认为这个钱包不错，那么您什么也没看到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_00002A99_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, now that was a match. It's no mean feat to knock Rocco off his block, let me tell you. You're almost in line to be the next challenger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，现在这是一场比赛。让我告诉你，将罗科从他的街区中击倒绝非易事。您几乎将成为下一个挑战者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_000027B1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not bad, not bad at all. That was a damn good boxer you took down out there. Some people are even saying your name along with title shot. Not me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不错，真不错。那是你在场上击败的一位出色的拳击手。有些人甚至会在标题镜头的同时说出你的名字。不是我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_000024C4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you enjoyed that match, because it's uphill from here. I can't believe I'm saying this... but you're a contender now. God help us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你喜欢那场比赛，因为从这里开始是上坡路。我不敢相信我会这么说……但你现在是一个竞争者了。上帝帮助我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_000024BA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was one tall fucking tree to chop down, but you did it. You've come a long way, but don't get lackadaisical on me. I fucking love that word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是一棵他妈的高大的树需要砍倒，但你做到了。你已经走了很长的路，但不要对我无精打采。我他妈喜欢这个词。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_000024B1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Flutter Tang isn't exactly a contender, but he isn't a pushover either. Stay hungry, and you might turn into something special. Or not.
ESP.TRADUIT: Flutter Tang 并不是一个真正的竞争者，但他也不是一个容易被打败的人。保持饥饿，你可能会变得很特别。或不。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_00002496_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tommy deserved a beating for that shitty haircut alone. You got yourself a decent purse, and a little bump in the rankings. Not bad for a bum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 汤米光是因为那个糟糕的发型就该挨一顿打。你为自己赢得了不错的钱包，并且排名也有了一些提升。对于一个流浪汉来说还不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_0000248D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope your jewels are still intact after that bout. Goddamn Brennan was a cunt to fight that way. Keep this up, and you might become legitimate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望那场比赛之后你的珠宝仍然完好无损。该死的布伦南就是一个用这种方式战斗的混蛋。坚持下去，你可能会变得合法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_00002484_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you whipped the junkie, aren't you special. Next time I'll have to round up some hobos for you. Keep climbing, bigger and better things await.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你鞭打了瘾君子，你不是很特别吗？下次我得为你召集一些流浪汉。继续攀登，更大更好的事情在等待着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_0000247B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and here's a little extra. Seems these hicks enjoy watching you bleed on my canvas, so we have a new sponsor: Crimson Caravan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，还有一点额外的。看来这些乡巴佬很喜欢看你在我的画布上流血，所以我们有了一个新的赞助商：Crimson Caravan。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_0000247B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In more civilized places, I imagine it would be against the law to let someone kick the shit out of an old man. Good thing we ain't civilized.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在更文明的地方，我想如果有人把老人踢屎的话，那是违法的。还好我们不文明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_00002470_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you beat Johnny. Congratu-fucking-lations, you've graduated from tomato... to bum. Come see me when you want to fight again, bum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你打败了约翰尼。恭喜——他妈的——你已经从番茄毕业了……变成了流浪汉。当你想再次战斗时就来找我吧，混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_00002464_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sweet Christ, that old fucker was practically carried into the ring, and you couldn't summon the gumption to knock him over? Fucking tomato.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪，那个老混蛋几乎被带进了擂台，你就没有勇气把他打倒吗？该死的番茄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_00001E91_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was defeated by Old Roy Palmer. Any chance I can fight again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被老罗伊·帕尔默打败了。我还有机会再战吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Were you drunk when you stumbled into the ring? You're a goddamn disease, that's what you are. Get out before you infect my gym, loser.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你跌跌撞撞进入擂台时你喝醉了吗？你就是一种该死的疾病，这就是你。在你感染我的健身房之前滚出去，失败者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_00002465_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was defeated by Porcelain Johnny. Any chance I can fight again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被瓷器约翰尼打败了。我还有机会再战吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, I was almost ready to mistake you for a potential sparring partner... not a real fighter, but not a tomato. I was wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，我几乎准备把你误认为是潜在的陪练伙伴……不是真正的战士，但不是西红柿。我错了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_00002471_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was defeated by Dirty Don Juan. Any chance I can fight again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被肮脏的唐璜打败了。我还有机会再战吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: To be fair, you ain't the first to get the wind and a lot more knocked out of them by Brennan. You better shape up, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 公平地说，你并不是第一个得到风声的人，布伦南击倒了更多的人。不过你最好把身材调整好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_0000247C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was defeated by Fifty Balls Brennan. Any chance I can fight again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被五十球布伦南击败了。我还有机会再战吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You let that goddamn hillbilly run right over you. You remember what I told you? Protect yourself at all times. In one ear and out the other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你让那个该死的乡巴佬从你身上碾过。你还记得我告诉你的话吗？时刻保护自己。一只耳朵进，另一只耳朵出。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_00002485_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was defeated by Tommy Mullet. Any chance I can fight again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被汤米·鲻鱼打败了。我还有机会再战吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get out, loser. Come back when you find your heart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚出去吧，失败者。当你找到你的心时就回来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_0000248E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was defeated by Flutter Tang. Any chance I can fight again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被唐飘飘打败了。我还有机会再战吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a word in Spanish for fighters like you... cobarde.
ESP.TRADUIT: 西班牙语中有一个词形容像你这样的战士……cobarde。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_00002497_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was defeated by El Guapo. Any chance I can fight again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被埃尔瓜波打败了。我还有机会再战吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You fought a man with the IQ of a bumbling rodent, and you somehow managed to lose. Amazing. Down the ranks you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你与一个智商只有笨手笨脚的啮齿类动物的人战斗，但不知何故你输了。惊人的。你的排名会下降。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_000024B2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was defeated by Drederick Dementia. Any chance I can fight again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被德雷德里克·痴呆打败了。我还有机会再战吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got to stop making excuses and starting showing results if you want to move up in the ranks. Fucking pathetic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想晋升，就必须停止找借口并开始展示成果。真他妈可悲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_000024BB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was defeated by Diabetes Leonard. Any chance I can fight again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被糖尿病伦纳德打败了。我还有机会再战吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamit, you were getting close. Just one match away, probably. Oh fucking well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的，你已经很接近了。可能只剩下一场比赛了。哦他妈的好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_000024C5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was defeated by Bull Rocco. Any chance I can fight again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被布尔罗科打败了。我还有机会再战吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That hurts, getting so fucking close to the belt. Something tells me you'll get another run at it before too long, so buck up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太他妈靠近腰带了，太疼了。我感觉不久之后你就会再次尝试，所以振作起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_000027B2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was defeated by Bruce Ali. Any chance I can fight again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被布鲁斯·阿里打败了。我还有机会再战吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You had your shot and you took it. Nobody can take that away from you, not ever. Maybe next time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有你的机会并且你接受了。没有人能把它从你身边夺走，永远不会。下一次吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_00002A9B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was defeated by Adamantium Mike. Any chance I can fight again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被艾德曼金属迈克打败了。我还有机会再战吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess you're back to being a tomato again. Somebody should write a book about you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你又变回西红柿了。有人应该写一本关于你的书。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRCollectPr_00002AAB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I lost the title.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我失去了头衔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds good. When can I fight?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来不错。我什么时候可以战斗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whenever you want. Just get your mind right and come see me when you're ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论你什么时候想要。只要调整好心态，准备好后就来见我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRNameCool_0000104F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever. When can I fight?
ESP.TRADUIT: 任何时间。我什么时候可以战斗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whenever you want. Just get your mind right and come see me when you're ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论你什么时候想要。只要调整好心态，准备好后就来见我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRNameIndif_0000105C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That name sucks. You got anything better?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这名字真烂你还有更好的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. Apparently my taste in names has fallen off. I got just the thing for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我懂了。显然我对名字的品味已经下降了。我正好给你准备了这个东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRNameHateI_0000105D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: From here on out, you'll be known as "Rimjob" in the ring, cause sticking your tongue in someone's ass is all you're good for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从现在开始，你将在擂台上被称为“Rimjob”，因为把你的舌头伸进别人的屁股里就是你的拿手好戏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRNameHateI_0000105D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, if you want a match, come talk to me, and we'll set you up... Rimjob.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，如果你想要一场比赛，请来找我，我们会为你安排... Rimjob。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRNameHateI_0000105D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your chin down and your guard up. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保持下巴低下，保持警惕。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRPreFightR_0000105F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your chin down and your guard up. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保持下巴低下，保持警惕。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dempsey [02000F2E] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\KingOfTheRing.esp\aaDempseyVoiceType\aaKOTRMast_aaKOTRPreFightR_00001E94_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Championship bout}Ladies and gentlemen, I'd like to welcome you to tonight's championship bout, which is sponsored by the Crimson Caravan.
ESP.TRADUIT: {冠军赛}女士们先生们，我欢迎你们参加今晚的冠军赛，这场比赛是由深红商队赞助的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Referee [020015DD] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Rank 3 and over}Ladies and gentlemen, I'd like to welcome you to tonight's event, which is sponsored by the Crimson Caravan. This will be a fight to the finish.
ESP.TRADUIT: {等级 3 及以上}女士们先生们，我欢迎你们参加今晚由深红大篷车赞助的活动。这将是一场战斗到底。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Referee [020015DD] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Rank 2}Ladies and gentlemen, I'd like to welcome you to tonight's event, which is sponsored by Billy Bob's Moon Pies. This will be a fight to the finish.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Rank 2}女士们先生们，欢迎你们参加今晚的活动，该活动由 Billy Bob's Moon Pies 赞助。这将是一场战斗到底。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Referee [020015DD] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Rank 1, Kid}Ladies and gentlemen, I'd like to welcome you to tonight's event, which is sponsored by Radon Crown Cola. This will be a fight to the finish.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Rank 1, Kid}女士们先生们，我欢迎你们参加今晚由氡皇冠可乐赞助的活动。这将是一场战斗到底。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Referee [020015DD] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Kid}In the northwest corner, we have a rising star in the New Vegas boxing scene... The Kid!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Kid}在西北角，我们有新维加斯拳击界的一颗冉冉升起的新星......Kid！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Referee [020015DD] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: {TITLE DEFENSE}In the northwest corner, we have the reigning champion!
ESP.TRADUIT: {TITLE DEFENSE}在西北角，我们有卫冕冠军！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Referee [020015DD] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Kid - challenger}In the northwest corner, we have tonight's challenger for the title... The Kid!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Kid - 挑战者}在西北角，我们有今晚的冠军挑战者......Kid！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Referee [020015DD] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Rimjob}In the northwest corner, we have a rising star in the New Vegas boxing scene... Rimjob!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Rimjob}在西北角，我们有新维加斯拳击界的一颗冉冉升起的新星...... Rimjob！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Referee [020015DD] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Rimjob - Challenger}In the northwest corner, we have tonight's challenger for the title... Rimjob!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Rimjob - 挑战者}在西北角，我们有今晚的冠军挑战者...Rimjob！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Referee [020015DD] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Opponent, TITLE DEFENSE}And in the southeast corner, the challenger!
ESP.TRADUIT: {对手，TITLE DEFENSE}在东南角，挑战者！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Referee [020015DD] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Opponent, rank 11, Title attempt}And in the southeast corner, the mutant with the iron fists, and defending champion... Adamantium Mike!
ESP.TRADUIT: {对手，排名11，夺冠尝试}而在东南角，铁拳变种人，卫冕冠军……艾德曼麦克！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Referee [020015DD] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Opponent, rank 10}And in the southeast corner, the Redding Ravager, Bruce Ali!
ESP.TRADUIT: {对手，排名10}还有东南角的雷丁掠夺者，布鲁斯·阿里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Referee [020015DD] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Opponent, rank 9}And in the southeast corner, the Freeside Freight Train, "Bull" Rocco!
ESP.TRADUIT: {对手，排名9}还有东南角，自由货运列车，“公牛”罗科！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Referee [020015DD] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Opponent, rank 8}And in the southeast corner, "Terminal" Diabetes Leonard!
ESP.TRADUIT: {对手，排名8}还有东南角“糖尿病终点站”伦纳德！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Referee [020015DD] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Opponent, rank 7}And in the southeast corner, the {Asks aloud}big fist, ... Drederick Dementia!
ESP.TRADUIT: {对手，排名7}而在东南角，{大声问道}大拳头，……德雷德里克痴呆！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Referee [020015DD] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Opponent, rank 6}And in the southeast corner, El Chingon del Desierto, ... El Guapo! May the best fighter win!
ESP.TRADUIT: {对手，排名 6}在东南角，El Chingon del Desierto，...El Guapo！愿最优秀的战士获胜！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Referee [020015DD] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Opponent, rank 5}And in the southeast corner, the Westside Wildman, the New Vegas Eviscerator... Flutter Tang!
ESP.TRADUIT: {对手，排名5}而东南角，西域野人，新维加斯剔骨者……扑腾！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Referee [020015DD] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Opponent, rank 4}And in the southeast corner, the hillbilly hellraiser, the {Questions reading this}hick with the dick... Tommy Mullet!
ESP.TRADUIT: {对手，排名 4}而在东南角，乡下人地狱狂，{阅读本文的问题}乡巴佬……汤米·穆莱特！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Referee [020015DD] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Opponent, rank 3}And in the southeast corner, the terror of testicles, the smasher of scrotums, Fifty Balls Brennan!
ESP.TRADUIT: {对手，排名3}而在东南角，睾丸的恐怖，阴囊的粉碎者，五十球布伦南！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Referee [020015DD] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Opponent, rank 2}And in the southeast corner, the fetid firecracker, the putrid pirate, Dirty Don Juan!
ESP.TRADUIT: {对手，等级2}而在东南角，恶臭的鞭炮，腐烂的海盗，肮脏的唐璜！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Referee [020015DD] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Opponent, rank 1}And in the southeast corner, the graying grizzly, the senile serpent, Old Roy Palmer!
ESP.TRADUIT: {对手，等级1}在东南角，灰白的灰熊，衰老的蛇，老罗伊·帕尔默！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Referee [020015DD] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Rank 0, Kid}Ladies and gentlemen, I'd like to welcome you to tonight's event, which is sponsored by Breach Brand Muffins. This will be a fight to the finish.
ESP.TRADUIT: {排名 0，孩子}女士们先生们，我欢迎你们参加今晚的活动，该活动由 Breach Brand Muffins 赞助。这将是一场战斗到底。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Referee [020015DD] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the northwest corner, we have a new face to Dempsey's, a young up and comer, hungry with ambition, eager for success... The Kid!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在西北角，我们看到了登普西的新面孔，一个年轻的后起之秀，雄心勃勃，渴望成功......孩子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Referee [020015DD] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: And in the southeast corner, fresh from his stint in physical therapy, Porcelain Johnny!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在东南角，刚结束物理治疗的瓷器约翰尼！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Referee [020015DD] (mod) Quest : ([02001019]aaKOTRMaster) Master Variables and Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Champ
ESP.TRADUIT: 冠军

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am the greatest! As the reigning champion, you deal additional Unarmed damage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是最棒的！作为卫冕冠军，你会造成额外的徒手伤害。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've lost the Champ perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经失去了冠军特权。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've heard rumors that a new boxing gym has opened near Westside, apparently operated by a ghoul, Dempsey. By all accounts, he is actively recruiting boxers to compete in lucrative prize fights held every evening. Perhaps you should speak with Dempsey and begin your career as a professional pugilist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说过有传言说西区附近新开了一家拳击馆，显然是由食尸鬼邓普西经营的。据了解，他正在积极招募拳击手参加每天晚上举行的利润丰厚的拳击比赛。也许您应该与登普西谈谈并开始您作为职业拳击手的职业生涯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: King of the Ring
ESP.TRADUIT: 拳王

ESP.ORIGINAL: Congratulations! By claiming the title, you've earned the Champ perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恭喜！通过获得冠军头衔，您就获得了冠军特权。
